message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer still gives you a significant share.
I think 60-40 is more than fair, considering the inflation affects you more than me.
Bob, this is my final offer.  Take it or leave it. The value will only decrease for me.
You said it yourself, the value will only decrease for you. I'm willing to take a bit less than my previous offer, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
